source:
**Space Floor Level Reference Data**

This notebook loads data to deltalake table etlhubconfirmed.dhtr_space_floor_level by sourceing data from GREIW database.

from azure.storage.blob import BlobClient
import pandas as pd
from io import StringIO
from pyspark.sql.functions import md5, concat_ws,trim
from sqlite3 import connect
from pyspark.sql import functions as F
#conn = connect(':memory:')
from pyspark.sql.functions import col
from pyspark.sql import SparkSession 
from pyspark.sql.types import * 
from delta.tables import *
import os
import sys
from datetime import datetime

account_name = 'adls4fsoetlhubdevuseast' # fill in your primary account name 
container_name = 'etlhubfilestorage' # fill in your container name 
relative_path = 'extract/reference/' # fill in your relative folder path 
relative_archive_path='archive/'
file_name='DS_space_floor_level.csv' 
natural_key="FLOOR_ID"
tablename="etlhubconfirmed.dhtr_space_floor_level"
stagingtable="dhtsr_space_floor_level"
date = datetime.now().strftime("%Y_%m_%d-%I:%M:%S_%p")
Copy source CSV file to archive folder including timestamp in file name

#Read data from adls csv file extracted from source at 
https://adls4fsoetlhubdevuseast.dfs.core.windows.net/etlhubfilestorage/extract/reference/DS_space_floor_level.csv

adls_path = 'abfss://%s@%s.dfs.core.windows.net/%s' % (container_name, account_name, relative_path) 
print('Primary storage account path: ' + adls_path) 

adls_arch_path = 'abfss://%s@%s.dfs.core.windows.net/%s' % (container_name, account_name, relative_archive_path) 
print('Primary storage account path: ' + adls_path) 

relative_archive_path
# Read a csv file 
csv_path = adls_path + file_name
arch_fil_name=file_name.rsplit(".")
csv_archive_path = adls_arch_path + arch_fil_name[0] + '_' + date + '.' + arch_fil_name[1]
print (csv_archive_path)

incrementalData_DF = spark.read.load(csv_path,format="csv", sep=",", header="true")

incrementalData_DF.write.csv(csv_archive_path, header = 'true')
#incrementalData_DF.show()

incrementalData_DF.write \
  .format("delta") \
  .mode("overwrite") \
  .option("overwriteSchema", "true") \
  .option("path", "abfss://etlhubfilestorage@adls4fsoetlhubdevuseast.dfs.core.windows.net/deltalake/staging/{}".format(stagingtable)) \
  .saveAsTable(stagingtable)
   #.option("overwriteSchema", "true") \  .save("") \

qry_4_delete="""

DELETE FROM {} 

"""
df_4_delete=spark.sql(qry_4_delete.format(tablename))
print('Existing records are deleted') 
df_4_delete.show()

qry_ins_new_rows="""

INSERT INTO {}
select 
FLOOR_ID,
FLOOR_DESCR,
USAGE_NOTES
from DHTS_OPPORTUNITY_ROLE A 
WHERE existing_REC_CHECKSUM is null
AND NOT EXISTS
(SELECT 1 FROM etlhubConfirmed.dht_opportunity_role B
WHERE A.ROLE_CD=B.ROLE_CD
and b.CURRENT_IND='Y'
AND A.column_hash=B.REC_CHECKSUM)

--limit 10
;
"""

d=spark.sql(qry_ins_new_rows)

#d.show(10)

#Insert for New rows which are missing in target and present in source based on Natural Key.
#delete FROM etlhubconfirmed.dht_opportunity_role;

qry_4_recon1="""
SELECT COUNT(*) from DHTS_OPPORTUNITY_ROLE A 
WHERE existing_REC_CHECKSUM is null
AND NOT EXISTS
(SELECT 1 FROM {} B
WHERE A.ROLE_CD=B.ROLE_CD
and b.CURRENT_IND='Y'
AND A.column_hash=B.REC_CHECKSUM)

"""
df_4_recon1=spark.sql(qry_4_recon1.format(tablename))

qry_ins_new_rows="""

INSERT INTO etlhubconfirmed.dht_opportunity_role
select 
COALESCE(A.existing_MAX_KEY,0) + ROW_NUMBER () OVER (ORDER BY 1) AS OPPORTUNITY_ROLE_KEY,1 as OPPORTUNITY_ROLE_VERSION 
,ROLE_CD
,ROLE_DESC
,'Y' AS CURRENT_IND
,CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AS EXTRACT_DT
,CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AS REC_START_DT
,'9999-12-31 00:00:00.000' as REC_END_DT
,'ESA' AS SOURCE_SYSTEM
,column_hash as REC_CHECKSUM
,'I' as REC_STATUS
,current_timestamp as IMG_LST_UPD_DT
,CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AS IMG_CREATED_DT
,'ED' AS DATA_IND
,'Y' AS ACTIVE_IN_SOURCE_IND 
from DHTS_OPPORTUNITY_ROLE A 
WHERE existing_REC_CHECKSUM is null
AND NOT EXISTS
(SELECT 1 FROM etlhubConfirmed.dht_opportunity_role B
WHERE A.ROLE_CD=B.ROLE_CD
and b.CURRENT_IND='Y'
AND A.column_hash=B.REC_CHECKSUM)

--limit 10
;
"""

d=spark.sql(qry_ins_new_rows)

#d.show(10)

#Update or expire the rows with existing instance of the changed rows:
qry_4_upd_changes_rows="""

MERGE INTO {} A
USING DHTS_OPPORTUNITY_ROLE B
ON A.{} = B.{}
AND LOWER(B.{}) = LOWER(B.existing_{}) 
and LOWER(B.column_hash) <> LOWER(B.existing_rec_checksum)
AND A.CURRENT_IND='Y' AND A.REC_START_DT=b.existing_REC_START_DT
WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET CURRENT_IND='N'
    ,REC_END_DT= REC_START_DT -  INTERVAL 1 seconds --current_timestamp --existing_REC_START_DT-1
    ,IMG_LST_UPD_DT=current_timestamp
;
"""
f=spark.sql(qry_4_upd_changes_rows.format(tablename,natural_key,natural_key,natural_key,natural_key))

#Insert for changed rows which are missing in target and present in source based on Natural Key.
qry_ins_changed_rows="""
INSERT INTO etlhubconfirmed.dht_opportunity_role
select A.existing_OPPORTUNITY_ROLE_KEY
,1 + existing_OPPORTUNITY_ROLE_VERSION as OPPORTUNITY_ROLE_VERSION
,ROLE_CD
,ROLE_DESC
,'Y' AS CURRENT_IND
,CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AS EXTRACT_DT
,CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AS REC_START_DT
,'9999-12-31 00:00:00.000' as REC_END_DT
,'ESA' AS SOURCE_SYSTEM
,column_hash as REC_CHECKSUM
,'U' as REC_STATUS
, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP as IMG_LST_UPD_DT
,A.existing_IMG_CREATED_DT AS IMG_CREATED_DT
,'LG' AS DATA_IND
,'Y' AS ACTIVE_IN_SOURCE_IND 
from DHTS_OPPORTUNITY_ROLE A 
WHERE TRIM(LOWER(ROLE_CD)) = TRIM(LOWER(existing_ROLE_CD)) 
and LOWER(column_hash) <> LOWER(existing_rec_checksum)
AND NOT EXISTS
(SELECT 1 FROM etlhubConfirmed.dht_opportunity_role B
WHERE TRIM(LOWER(A.ROLE_CD))=TRIM(LOWER(B.ROLE_CD))
and b.CURRENT_IND='Y'
AND A.column_hash=B.REC_CHECKSUM
)
;
"""
e=spark.sql(qry_ins_changed_rows)
#e.show(4)

#Soft Deletes - Update Active_Ind for the rows no longer active in source:

qry_4_upd_deleted_rows="""

MERGE INTO {} A
USING DHTS_OPPORTUNITY_ROLE B
ON A.{} = B.existing_{}
AND B.{} is NULL
AND A.CURRENT_IND='Y' AND A.ACTIVE_IN_SOURCE_IND='Y' 
AND A.REC_START_DT=b.existing_REC_START_DT
WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET ACTIVE_IN_SOURCE_IND='N'
    ,IMG_LST_UPD_DT=current_timestamp

;
"""
g=spark.sql(qry_4_upd_deleted_rows.format(tablename,natural_key,natural_key,natural_key))

%%sql
select 'Number of Active Rows' as Title,count(*) from etlhubconfirmed.dht_opportunity_role where CURRENT_IND='Y'
;

select 'Duplicate Rows based on surrogate key' as Title,OPPORTUNITY_ROLE_KEY,count(*) from etlhubconfirmed.dht_opportunity_role where CURRENT_IND='Y'
    group by OPPORTUNITY_ROLE_KEY
    having count(*)>1
;

select 'Duplicate Rows based on natural key' as Title,ROLE_CD,count(*) from etlhubconfirmed.dht_opportunity_role where CURRENT_IND='Y'
    group by ROLE_CD
    having count(*)>1
;

select 'New rows inserted in this run' as Title,count(*) from etlhubconfirmed.dht_opportunity_role where CURRENT_IND='Y'
    and date(extract_dt)=CURRENT_DATE and rec_status='I'
;

select 'Changed rows inserted in this run' as Title,count(*) from etlhubconfirmed.dht_opportunity_role where CURRENT_IND='Y'
    and date(extract_dt)=current_date and rec_status='U'
;

select 'Changed rows updated in this run' as Title,count(*) from etlhubconfirmed.dht_opportunity_role where CURRENT_IND='N'
    and date(REC_END_DT)=CURRENT_DATE --and rec_status='I'
;

select 'Rows no longer active in source' as Title,count(*) from etlhubconfirmed.dht_opportunity_role where CURRENT_IND='Y'
    AND 
     date(REC_END_DT)=current_date --and rec_status='I'
;
